main event: Four dimly lit triangular objects with a bright spot in the center were observed traveling slowly from West to East in Hungary in January 1956.
interesting points: The objects formed a square in a horizontal plane, with each object rotating around the center as if rigidly connected.
No noise, exhaust, or vapor trail was observed, and weather conditions were clear with 100% visibility and no wind.
The UFOs were estimated to be at an altitude of 3,000 meters and were seen for a total of 6 minutes.
The report indicates that it was unsure whether the objects were aircraft, possibly gliders, or another unknown aerial phenomenon.
The sighting was made by a civilian source and was categorized as a Ground-Visual observation.
sighted object: Four dimly lit triangular objects with a bright spot in the center
